name: RackForms Express Web Form Builder
author: nicSoft

sections.description:
At nicSoft we believe “core” form software to send email and save entries to a database shouldn’t cost a dime.

That’s why we’re proud to offer RackForms Express for WordPress. A totally free and unlimited form plugin that redefines the WordPress form creation landscape!

Build anything from simple contact forms to multi-page applications that use conditional logic.

The best part is when we say free, we mean it. This means no advertisements, up sells, or premium versions to buy.

This is the real deal: Powerful and 100% free web form software!

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
Using The Plugin Manager:

  1. Visit the Plugins Section of your WordPress install and choose “add new.”
  2. Search for “RackForms Express”
  3. Select “install now” and activate the plugin.
  4. Click the RackForms Menu item and press the Install RackForms button.

Using a Custom Download:

  1. Download the current version from: https://wordpress.org/plugins/rackforms-express/
  2. Visit the Plugins Section of your WordPress install and choose “add new.”
  3. Select “upload” from the links at the top, and then select the file you downloaded.
  4. Activate the plugin once the upload completes.
  5. Click the RackForms Menu item and press the Install RackForms button.

That’s it! Enjoy!
sections.faq:
Where can I go for help?

We can be reached at info at rackforms dot com
sections.changelog:
1.5

-Fix for install paths on some servers, better compatibility with 4.6.
-Updated Installer For PHP 5.6+ OpenSSL Behavior.

1.4

-Fix for install paths on some servers, better compatibility with 4.1.

1.3

-Bug fix for responsive form code iframe loading.

1.2

-Bug fix for responsive form code.

1.1

-Added Automatic Responsive Version For Mobile Browsers.

1.0

  • Initial Release
